concept.name: WordNet
concept.description: WordNet is a lexical database of semantic relations between words.

concept.name: VerbNet
concept.description: The VerbNet project maps PropBank verb types to their corresponding Levin classes. It is a lexical resource that incorporates both semantic and syntactic information.

concept.name: PropBank
concept.description: PropBank is a corpus that is annotated with verbal propositions and their argumentsâ€”a "proposition bank".

concept.name: BNC
concept.description: The British National Corpus (BNC) is a 100-million-word text corpus of samples of written and spoken English from a wide range of sources.
